/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in different hues, adding a vibrant splash of color to the cityscape. Cars of various colors are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the city environment.
